Data Fields
device_gpio_t Struct Reference
Device Configuration

Structure defining a GPIO port/pin combination. More...

#include <device.h>

Collaboration diagram for device_gpio_t:

Detailed Description

This structure defines a GPIO port/pin combination used in configuring devices.

Data Fields

int8_t port
 The GPIO port number (-1 means not used)
 
int8_t pin
 The GPIO pin number.
